attributes.action: Reduce the age of allowing to draw on your private pension from 55 to 50
attributes.additional_details: To help millions of people that are between these ages like myself that have to wait another two years to draw form my private pension but could desperately do with that money now
attributes.background: As stated above reduce the age from 55 to 50 to be able to draw on your private as a matter of urgency, this will also take of some of the financial strain the govt is under at the moment i would imagine
